mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cupps at Christmas
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cupps at Christmas, undated, the man in the red sweater in the second photo is Courtney "Corky" Old, the little boy in the photo is Michael Cupp, a boy who had Leukemia, the man in the front row on the left was Tom Roseberry, the man on the front row on the right is Chat Williams, and the man in the Santa costume is Pat, with no last name given.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
